snippet: At least two Ugandan military helicopters, key assets in a push against militants in Somalia, “lost communication” somewhere in Kenyan airspace and may have crashed, officials said.
lead_paragraph: At least two Ugandan military helicopters, key assets in a push against militants in Somalia, “lost communication” somewhere in Kenyan airspace and may have crashed, officials said.

headline.main: Ugandan Copters, en Route to Battle Shabab, Disappear Over Kenya
headline.print_headline: Ugandan Copters, En Route to Battle Shabab, Disappear Over Kenya
